**Access Control:**
- Route-level authentication decorators
- API bearer token authentication
- Read-only query parameters for tool access
- Comprehensive audit logging

**File Security:**
- Upload size limits (25MB)
- Extension allowlisting
- MIME type validation
- Content sanitization

---

## Current Web Interface Capabilities

### Browse Interface (`memory.nsgia.com/view`)

**Features:**
- Search with keyword filtering
- Source-based filtering (dropdown selection)
- Date range filtering capabilities
- Pagination with configurable limits
- Real-time result counts

**Conversation Display:**
- Card-based layout with previews
- Title, source, and timestamp display
- Character count and summary preview
- Temporary link generation (15-minute expiry)
- Export functionality per conversation

**Current Data:**
- 69 conversations stored and accessible
- Multiple source types tracked
- Full-text search across content and summaries

### Save Interface (`memory.nsgia.com/save`)

**Manual Input Features:**
- Conversation title (auto-generated if empty)
- Source selection dropdown
- Large text area for full conversation content
- Optional summary field
- Tag system with comma-separated values

**Data Processing:**
- Automatic title generation from content
- Content hash generation for deduplication
- Real-time character counting
- Form validation and error handling

### Individual Conversation Views

**Detailed Display:**
- Full conversation content with formatting
- Metadata display (source, dates, character count)
- Summary prominently featured
- Export options (multiple formats planned)
- Temporary link sharing with expiration tracking

---
